 2012-05392012-04-26PS,  CBSA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx Gratia Payments - International Organization for Migration
PrecisOrder authorizing the President of the Canada Border Services Agency, to make payments up to a maximum combined value of $26,982,941 on a discretionary basis, referred to as EX GRATIA PAYMENTS, to the INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR MIGRATION for activities directly related to the implementation and administration of the Assisted Voluntary Returns pilot program.
AttachmentsAttachment
